author: Staff Report
title: Monster Energy NASCAR Cup update: Drivers react to wild college football national championship game | NASCAR.com
text:
Drivers react to wild national championship game 
By Staff report | NASCAR.com | January 10, 2017 at 10.30 AM [{provider:'facebook',iconImgUp:'http://static.nascar.com/content/dam/nascar/social-icons/facebook.jpg',iconImgOver:'http://static.nascar.com/content/dam/nascar/social-icons/facebook-over.jpg'},{provider:'twitter',iconImgUp:'http://static.nascar.com/content/dam/nascar/social-icons/twitter.jpg',iconImgOver:'http://static.nascar.com/content/dam/nascar/social-icons/twitter-over.jpg'}] 
Clemson took down perennial powerhouse Alabama on Monday night in the College Football Playoff national championship game in stunning fashion, defeating the Crimson Tide 35-31. 
Drivers across NASCAR were paying attention, and took to Twitter to offer their thoughts on an instant classic. What a game!!!! #nationalchampionship
